thread.title: Huawei beats Xiaomi becomes Chinas No. 1 smartphone maker Canalys
thread.title_full: Huawei beats Xiaomi becomes Chinas No. 1 smartphone maker Canalys

title: Huawei beats Xiaomi becomes Chinas No. 1 smartphone maker Canalys
text:
Huawei beats Xiaomi, becomes China's No. 1 smartphone maker: Canalys 
Times Of India Saturday 24th October, 2015 
Huawei rose to first place with 81% y-o-y shipment growth in Q3, following a strong showing the previous quarter as well. Xiaomi logged a decrease in shipments from last year....
